output.sentences: The annual festival was already underway.
There were so many people there from all around the city.
They had all gathered together in celebration, sharing their hand crafted trinkets.
Children raised on parent's shoulders lifted up their handcrafted mementos.
The crowd stood still, waiting for the festival's main performance to begin,
